description: image illustrating "Crooked Man" nursery rhyme; thin, stooped man wearing a tall black wooly cap and knickers, walking with a crooked cane; cat catching a mouse in front of man on path; crooked house in background, ULC, with twisting chimney; restrike, numbered 1/6

title: Crooked Man
